short_summary: Advance Contract Award Notice for Digitla National Security Archive
description: ProQuest LLC are being to provide access to Digital National Security Archive which is the largest digitized collection of US Freedom of Information releases related to international affairs, security, and intelligence records.
full_summary:
Yesterday, I was privy to the release announcement of a government tender, specifically, the publication of an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) posted on the Canada Government Gazette.

**Procurement Information**
| Category | Title | Description                                                                                        |
|----------|-------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| ACAN     | Digital National Security Archive| Perpetual access to a comprehensive digital collection of primary documents related to U.S. foreign and military policy since 1945 |
|          |                                              Established in partnership with the National Security Archive. |

Below are the details necessary to competitively bid:

* **Opening Date**: The current solicitation deadline has elapsed, as evidenced by the status of the tender at Expired.
* **Pre-Qualifications**: Suppliers are allowed to signal their interest to participate in the tender by submitting a statement of capabilities by no later than the stipulated closing date.
* **Bid Schedule**: One supplier has already been identified and pre-selected, with ProQuest LLC designated as the preferred provider.
* **Contract Value**: The estimated total contract value, including additional periods, is C$ 130,794.
* **Contract Term**: The expected lifespan of the contract spans 14 months, culminating on 28th February 2025.

Tenders respecting the outlined specification must submit their responses by the relevant deadlines in order to meet the qualification requirements and be considered for the opportunity.

**Eligibility Guidelines**

Any supplier interested in participating is allowed to submit an expression of capabilities up to **22nd February** (2: 00 PM EST). Prospective suppliers are required to ensure they meet all necessary criteria outlined in this notice to qualify for the project.

Additionally, please note the participation is open to bidders residing in Canada.

**Required Information and Appeal**

For inquiries or submissions, please contato (at your earliest convenience) the Strategic Procurement Advisor, Cristel St-Louis, via email: <Cristel.St-Louis@bac-lac.gc.ca>. 

Kindly visit the [bibliotheque-et-archives / invitation_to_bidders]( archives URL link when released on BAC official site).
